VideoPlayback.commandLineArgs: --package-repositories "$(PackageRepositories)" -o "$(MSBuildThisFileDirectory)..\help\HowTo Play a video file with Skia.vl"

VideoCapture.commandLineArgs: --package-repositories "$(PackageRepositories)" -o "$(MSBuildThisFileDirectory)..\help\HowTo Capture video input from a camera for Skia.vl"
